    Components

    Overview of all major components in O2DES Studio.

    Component Categories

    Node Components

    Core building blocks for diagram nodes:

    • BaseNode - Base component for all nodes
    • RectangleNode - Rectangular shape node
    • DiamondNode - Diamond shape node
    • EllipseNode - Elliptical shape node
    • TableNode - Table-structured node
    • CustomNodes - Custom node implementations

    Main Components

    Primary application components:

    • Toolbar - Main application toolbar
    • PropertiesBar - Properties panel
    • ComponentDrawer - Component selection drawer
    • ShortcutsHelp - Keyboard shortcuts help

    Utility Components

    Helper and management components:

    • ComponentManager - Component lifecycle management
    • NodeRegistry - Node type registration and management

    Best Practices

    Common guidelines for component development:

    • Component composition
    • Props and interfaces
    • State management
    • Performance optimization
    • Error handling
    • Accessibility

    Testing Guide

    Guidelines for component testing:

    • Unit tests
    • Integration tests
    • Test utilities
    • Mock data
